game.name: Coin Mechanica
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 『Coin Mechanica』 is a VR-compatible roguelike boomer shooter. Crush demonic invaders with a storm of coins and explosive blasts! Rip out the cores of vicious demons possessing treasure, then reduce their bodies to even more coins!
game.shortDescriptionEn: 『Coin Mechanica』 is a VR-compatible roguelike boomer shooter. Crush demonic invaders with a storm of coins and explosive blasts! Rip out the cores of vicious demons possessing treasure, then reduce their bodies to even more coins!
game.publishers: NITORONDORIRU, ドゥラララ_アトリエ
